ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p: The realistic detail of Full HD images invites you to enjoy a viewing experience that redefines reality
SMART TV 2.0: The Samsung Smart TV finds the movies and TV shows you like - and more. Navigate within the 5 Smart Hub content panels. Easily discover movies, shows and social posts with less searching and more watching
Dual Core Processor: Makes multitasking fast. Browse the web faster and quickly download Apps with this feature
Smart Hub: The new interface organizes your entertainment and content into 5 convenient panels: On TV, Movies and TV Shows, Social, Apps and a panel for your Photos, Videos and Music
Full Web Browser: All the benefits of Full Web Browsing, right on your TV. From social sites like Facebook and Twitter to news, weather, entertainment, blogs and more. Discover even more content possibilities with your Smart TV
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN32F6300 32" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV - Bundle - with Samsung WMN350M Mini Wall Mount
